alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 23 at 3:58PM MST until December 24 at 11:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 PM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts greather than 70 mph may be possible. * WHERE...High elevations, upper slopes, exposed peaks and ridges, and east slopes of the Sacramento mountains.. * WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 11 PM MST Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong westerly winds could topple trees, cause power interruptions, and blow about loose outdoor objects, even causing damage to light structures.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sacramento Mountains Below 7500 Feet; Sacramento Mountains Above 7500 Feet
